mapper.select: select * from oomall_ad where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0

select * from oomall_ad
`name` like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and `content` like CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and content like concat('%', #{content}, '%') and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into oomall_ad(link, name, content, pic_url, is_default, is_enabled, start_time, end_time, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) values (#{link}, #{name}, #{content}, #{picUrl}, #{beDefault}, #{beEnabled}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{beDeleted})
